medium: Cotton, silk, metal sequins, gold colored tape
title: Jacket
description: coarse weave black jacket with blue lining; deep side vents; heavy multicolored decoration on three edges with wide tape with applique embroidery and metallic trim and sequins--absent on PL front vent edge; front edges trimmed with woven black and brown tape and colored embroidery with two short ties; yoke, neck back and sleeve tops have elaborate, heavily (multicolored) embroidery on red satin with gold tape and sequins; lower back edge has satin bands--red, blue, green
